price: ហើយពួកគេបានលក់យូសុហ្វដោយតម្លៃថោកបំផុតតែ ប៉ុន្មានទៀរហាំប៉ុណ្ណោះ ហើយពួកគេជាពួកដែលមិនឱ្យតម្លៃចំពោះ យូសុហ្វឡើយ។
arabic: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَنِۭ بَخۡسٖ دَرَٰهِمَ مَعۡدُودَةٖ وَكَانُواْ فِيهِ مِنَ ٱلزَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: washarawhu bithamanin bakhsin darāhima maʿdūdatin wakānū fīhi mina al-zāhidīna
